"$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/info", "modified": "20180714132453956", "modifier": "jd" }, "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/images/done-button": { "created": "20180714141039720", "creator": "jd", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/images/done-button", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "text": "", "modified": "20180715053654185", "modifier": "jd" }, "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/readme": { "text": "This plugin is a simple versioning system for edited tiddlers, recorded as they are saved. It works though the following buttons: * {{$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/images/done-button}} will not just save the tiddler as usual, but will also save the previous version of that tiddler (all fields including //tags//, except //title//). * {{$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/images/delete-button}} will not just delete the tiddler as usual, but will also delete that tiddler's revisions. A ''Revisions'' tab can be found under ''info'' {{$:/core/images/info-button}}, and from there the following actions can be done to each revision: * → / ↓ : show the revision list as horizontal or vertical tabs * ''(show differences)'' / ''(hide differences)'' : shows/hides the differences between the revision and the current state of the tiddler. * ''(restore)'' : replace the current state of the tiddler with that revision (all fields including //tags//, except //title//). * ''(pin)'' / ''(unpin)'' : makes it so that the revision will not be deleted when the source tiddler is deleted, nor when the user-defined limit of revisions is reached. * ''(delete)'' : deletes that revision, pinned or not. !!! ''Changing the source tiddler's title'' * The source tiddler's title may be changed; its rev tiddlers will always follow it as long as "//Update (oldtitle) to (newtitle) in the tags and list fields of other tiddlers//" is checked when editing the source tiddler's title. !!! ''Blacklisting'' The ''keep-rev'' field of a tiddler will define how many revisions will be kept for that tiddler. Defaults to 3 if the field does not exist, or if it is empty. Here are other possible values for the field: * `no`: no revision will be saved * `all`: all revisions will be saved / no limit * `0`: same as "all". Use "no" instead if no revision should be kept * any `integer` greater than `0`: that number of revisions will be saved !!! ''Rev tiddler structure'' ``` title: $:/rev/<> list: [[Title of source tiddler]] rev-list: listItems [[inside list field]] of [[source tiddler]] rev-tags: [[tag 1]] tag2 rev-someotherfield: someotherfield's value ... and all other fields of source tiddler, to be prefixed 'rev-' ``` If the title already exists, it is incremented numerically. Restoring the revision will re-copy the stored rev-fields (the "rev-" prefix will be removed). !!! ''Notes'' The ~$:/core ''save'' and ''delete'' buttons are neither replaced nor overwritten. You can still use them alongside this plugin's buttons by setting their visibility at ~$:/ControlPanel > Appearance > Toolbars Project Homepage on Tiddlyspot", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/readme", "tags": "", "modifier": "jd", "modified": "20180715110638772", "creator": "jd", "created": "20180714083837795" }, "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/images/delete-button": { "created": "20180715050023671", "creator": "jd", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/images/delete-button", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "modified": "20180715103423963", "modifier": "jd" }, "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/macros/save": { "text": "\define saveRev(from source) <$wikify name="revSource" text="""<$text text="[["/>$source$<$text text="]]"/>"""> <$wikify name="revTitle" text="""$:/rev/<>"""> <$list filter="[$from$!is[missing]]" variable="checker"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> text={{{ [$from$get[text]] }}} list=<>/> <$list filter="[$from$fields[]] -title -text" variable="field"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field={{{ [addprefix[rev-]] }}} $value={{{ [$from$get] }}}/> \end \define keepRev(from) <$wikify name="deleteFilter" text=""" <$list filter="[$from$keep-rev[no]]">[$from$listed[]prefix[$:/rev]!has[pin]] <$list filter="[$from$!keep-rev[no]]" variable="notNo"> <$list filter="[$from$!keep-rev[all]]" variable="notAll"> <$list filter="[$from$get[keep-rev]]" variable="num"><$text text="[$from$listed[]prefix[$:/rev]!has[pin]] +[butlast["/><><$text text="]]"/> <$list filter="[$from$keep-rev[]]">[$from$listed[]prefix[$:/rev]!has[pin]] +[butlast[3]] """> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/> \end \define RevertButton() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$macrocall $name="saveRev" from="" source="<>"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$list filter="[fields[]] -title -text" variable="field"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/temp/recentTiddler}} $field={{{ [addprefix[rev-]] }}} $value={{{ [get] }}}/> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> $field=<>/> <$list filter="[fields[]prefix[rev-]]" variable="field"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field={{{ [removeprefix[rev-]] }}} $value={{{ [get] }}}/> <$macrocall $name="keepRev" from=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/recentTiddler"/> (restore) \end \define PinButton() <$list filter="[!has[pin]]"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> pin="yes"/> (pin) <$list filter="[has[pin]]"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> pin/> (unpin) \end \define DeleteButton() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> (delete) \end \define DiffTextButton() <$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/difftext]!text[yes]]" variable="stateCheck"> <$button set="$:/state/revTab/difftext" setTo="yes" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> (show differences) <$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/difftext]text[yes]]" variable="stateCheck"> <$button set="$:/state/revTab/difftext" setTo="no" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> (hide differences) \end \define revTabs(type)
<$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/tabType]!text[vertical]]" variable="tabType" emptyMessage=""" <$button set="$:/state/revTab/tabType" setTo="horizontal" style="width: auto; margin-left: auto;"> → """> <$button set="$:/state/revTab/tabType" setTo="vertical" style="width: auto; margin-left: auto;"> ↓ <$list filter="[listed[]has[pin]][listed[]!has[pin]] -[!prefix[$:/rev]]" variable="revTitle"> <$button set="$:/state/revTab" setTo=<> selectedClass=" tc-tab-selected"> <$text text={{{ [has[pin]get[created]] +[addprefix[・]] }}}/> <$text text={{{ [!has[pin]get[created]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[listed[]] -[!prefix[$:/rev]]" variable="revTitle"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/revTab" text=<> tag="div">
<> <> <> <>
text:  <$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/difftext]!text[yes]]" variable="stateCheck"> 
<$text text={{{ [get[text]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/difftext]text[yes]]" variable="stateCheck"> <$diff-text source={{{ [get[text]] }}} dest={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$list filter="[fields[]prefix[rev-]]" variable="field"> <$text text={{{ [removeprefix[rev-]] }}}/>:  <$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/difftext]!text[yes]]" variable="stateCheck"> 
<$text text={{{ [get] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/state/revTab/difftext]text[yes]]" variable="stateCheck"> <$list filter="[removeprefix[rev-]]" variable="currfield"> <$diff-text source={{{ [get] }}} dest={{{ [get] }}}/>
\end", "title": "$:/plugins/jd/plainrevs/macros/save", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "jd", "modified": "20180715095206656", "creator": "jd", "created": "20180715075800922" } } }
